div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, Apr. 4, 1924. NEW CORPORATIONS

body.p: Albany Pharmacy, 3101 West 63rd Street. Capital $5,000. Benjamin Cohen, Samuel Wernick, and M. Milgrob.
Independence Realty Company, 3804 Roosevelt Road. Capital $15,000. William Klibanow, Morris Alken, and Harry Friedman.
S & L Hosiery Company, 101 South Wells Street. Capital $10,000 Joseph and Lilian Sommers, and Abraham Levin.
Cell Clothing Company, 1336 South Halsted Street. General merchandise. Capital $20,000. Theodore and Anna Levy, and M. Zelenko.
The Moon Company, 2110 Walnut Street. Novelties. Capital $10,000. Jacob Schwartz, A. Brown, and Julius Bensabath.
